title: I’ll Never Lose To My First Love Who Acts As My Older Sister! - Novel Updates
genre: Ecchi   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Modern Day   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sister Complex
author: Sakura Uta
description:
Will it be first love or sister move that wins? A battle of love under one roof!

My plan to confess my love was supposed to be perfect. It was supposed to be! If it wasn’t for the shocking turn of events that the woman I was going to confess to, Maaya, became my step-sister. But I can’t give up! Once more, I will confront my older sister as a love interest, not as a younger brother.>
